contest-event.event-date:
Oct. 7, 2017 D West Wales BBA Festival Contest (Third Section)
West Wales BBA Festival Contest (Third Section) 30 Own Choice Test Piece Contest West Wales BBA Festival Contest west-wales-bba-festival-contest-third-section
None
Burry Port, Carmarthenshire, Wales, UK Best Instrumentalist: (cornet) — Upper Rhondda Band Oldest player in contest: John Walters (Upper Rhondda Brass) — 90 years of age Run in conjunction with section 4. Prizes - 1st £200, 2nd £125, 3rd £100. 5 bands competed.
Sept. 5, 2017, 2:49 p.m. July 4, 2020, 10:38 p.m.
1 Upper Rhondda Brass Band Jayne Thomas Variations on Laudate Dominum
2 Usk Brass Band Jeff Jones Dimensions
3 Cwmtawe District Youth Band Wayne Pedrick The Dark Side of the Moon
4 Ynyshir Band Gary Davies Variations on Laudate Dominum
5 Severn Tunnel Band Daniel Hall Smoke Sketches
Withdrawn Ogmore Valley Silver Band Unknown
